definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: Our company is specialized in the production of pet collar , traction with the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是一家專業生產寵物項圈，牽引帶的企業。

sentences.english: Man allegedly shocks stepdaughter with dog collar .
sentences.chinese: 繼父用狗的電子項圈電擊繼女。

sentences.english: Every monkey has a numbered collar, but each one also has a name.
sentences.chinese: 每隻猴子的項圈都有編號，不過它們同樣也有名字。

sentences.english: The older man was buried with jade and amber collars and bracelets and pearl ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 年長的男子的殉葬品有玉器琥珀項圈手鐲，珍珠飾品。

sentences.english: The Bark Control Collar effectively and humanely stops all barking when it is worn.
sentences.chinese: 只有在佩戴止吠項圈時，它纔會有效的阻止狗狗吠叫。

sentences.english: These two are marked with collars.
sentences.chinese: 這兩隻的脖子上戴有項圈。

sentences.english: As I turned the collar with my finger, I saw something else.
sentences.chinese: 我在手指上轉動那個項圈，於是看見了其他一些東西。

sentences.english: Around his neck was a crude collar.
sentences.chinese: 它脖子上戴着一個破項圈。

sentences.english: The new choker necklaces and drop single earring is best worn when you dress down.
sentences.chinese: 項圈和單邊長耳環是休閒打扮的最佳伴侶。

sentences.english: You can attach a message around their collar for your partner to find.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把字條拴在她的項圈上，等你的愛人發現。

sentences.english: XI It decks me only to mock me, this jewelled chain of mine.
sentences.chinese: 它裝飾我只是爲了對我嘲弄，我的這根珠寶項圈。

sentences.english: I've added some statements like statement crystal choker and rings.
sentences.chinese: 配上水晶的項圈和戒指。

sentences.english: Sounds great, but what happens if the dog's collar comes off?
sentences.chinese: 聽起來不錯，但是如果狗的項圈弄掉了呢？

sentences.english: Dog Collar Museum, Leeds Castle, Kent.
sentences.chinese: 狗項圈博物館，利茲城堡，肯特郡，英國。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
